persons_accredited_for_access_to_europea: DA EMPOLI#Stefano, LIOY#Federico Girolamo, Lembo#Carmen , Pirozzi#Emanuele
membership:
I-Com is associate member of the European Internet Forum (EIF). https://www.eifonline.org/members.html 
I-Com is also a member of the Global Trade and Innovation Policy Alliance (GTIPA). https://www.gtipa.org/
goals__remit: I-Com is an Italian think tank based in Rome and founded in 2005 by a group of scholars and managers to promote academic and policies-related debates and innovative analyses on competitiveness. I-Com set up its Brussels office to further develop its activities on a European stage. The institute focuses its research on three main areas, being Energy, Digital and Health.
relevant_communication:
Public Conferences organised from 10/2017 to 09/2018 in the European Institutions, accompanied by a related study carried out by I-Com:  
 
• The Mediterranean Gateway to the Energy Union. 
• Digital Health: the impact of big data & AI on EU healthcare system. 
• Making Europea Safer: data, networks and cloud. 
• Data Driven Innovation & AI: interoperability, ePrivacy and Free Data Flow.
